sentence.Network_en: Absurdly, it makes shoppers overpay farmers to grow too much food.
sentence.Network_cn: 荒谬的是，这样会使得购物者支付过多的钱让农民去种太多的粮食。

sentence.Network_en: She swapped her plain suit for an absurdly girlie dress.
sentence.Network_cn: 她脱下了朴素的套装，换上了一身古怪的少女装。

sentence.Network_en: Prices were still absurdly low, in his opinion.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他看来，价格依然低得离谱。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... absurdity 荒谬 absurdly 荒谬地 absurdness 荒谬.
警告年轻人：这是你必须知道的最重要的人生教... ... n. 自治，自治权2.自主权 absurdly 荒谬地，荒唐地 litmus 石蕊.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... crouch vi. 蹲伏 absurdly ad. 愚蠢地，荒唐可笑地 absurd a. 可笑的，荒谬的.

list.abs: ... 胡走游飞[ wander about] 胡作非为[ commit all kinds of outrages;act absurdly] 胡吣[ unreasonably hurl (invectives)].

entry.tran: 荒谬的；荒唐的；不合理的
entry.def: If you say that something is absurd, you are criticizing it because you think that it is ridiculous or that it does not make sense.

example.ex: It is absurd to be discussing compulsory redundancy policies for teachers...
example.tran: 讨论针对教师的强制裁员政策真是滑稽可笑。

example.ex: I've known clients of mine go to absurd lengths, just to avoid paying me a few pounds...
example.tran: 我知道我的一些客户就为了少付我几英镑，可谓无所不用其极。

means.word_mean: 1. in an absurd manner or to an absurd degree;

auth_sentence.content: Goodbye Rap does absurdly reminisce about "wearing ostrich".
auth_sentence.res_content: Goodbye Rap does absurdly reminisce about "wearing ostrich".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Goodbye Rap does absurdly reminisce about "wearing ostrich".

auth_sentence.content: The pace is relentless, but never absurdly fast OFF!
auth_sentence.res_content: The pace is relentless, but never absurdly fast OFF!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pace is relentless, but never absurdly fast OFF!

auth_sentence.content: They found Coalition officials absurdly young and inexperienced.
auth_sentence.res_content: They found Coalition officials absurdly young and inexperienced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They found Coalition officials absurdly young and inexperienced.

sentences.en: The paintings were sold for absurdly high prices.
sentences.cn: 那些画以高得出奇的价格售出。
